message.body:
Unfortunately, at the moment, the IPFS links seem to be hosted by pretty slow/overloaded peers. If you have IPFS installed, it would be great if you could help seeding the files: 
- After successfully downloading a file, go to your IPFS webui (http://localhost:5001/webui) and add the file under **Files > Select files...** 
OR 
- In a command line window enter: **ipfs pin add -r 46characterslongfilehash** 
(example, **ipfs pin add -r QmZhCTWN31Vj21DheDYUSLX7WadP8rirXssS9XPTzYmceD**)
